COEW - Community order England / Wales

newOffenceByResult.details:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 6 Years. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because the offence was aggravated by being committed whilst on bail, because the offence was committed during the operational period of a suspended sentence. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 44. Total custodial period: 6 Years.
 
 
NOVS - No surcharge
Reason: No reasons
Total custodial period: 6 Years.
